c74object.name: cambio~
c74object.digest: Signal-to-event version of change, for mostly-constant signals
c74object.description: The [cambio~] object outputs a signal's value if it changes. If the input signal to cambio~ wavers too much, it will not be able to detect distinct changes (i.e., don't use noise~ as your input).

method.name: signal
method.description: Send a signal to be analyzed for changes.

method.name: version
method.description: Print version information to the Max window.

entry.name: Outlet 1 [float]
entry.description: Outputs a float when an input signal's value changes. The rate of this output can be quite high, depending on your DSP and scheduler settings.
